Key Match Events: France won the match against Belgium with a score of 2-0
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium started strongly but France played better, especially in the second half
Post-Match Reflections: Kevin De Bruyne was critical of the team's performance, pointing to a lack of commitment from some team-mates
Miscellaneous Highlights: Amadou Onana agreed with De Bruyne, stating that motivation must never be lacking
